Name: SecurityGroupEgressRule
Documentation: The EC2 Security Group Rule is an embedded property of the AWS::EC2::SecurityGroup type.

Parameters.Name: DestinationSecurityGroupId
Parameters.Documentation:
Specifies the GroupId of the destination Amazon VPC security group.
Type: String

Parameters.Name: FromPort
Parameters.Documentation: The start of port range for the TCP and UDP protocols, or an ICMP type number. An ICMP type number of -1 indicates a wildcard (i.e., any ICMP type number).

Parameters.Name: IpProtocol
Parameters.Documentation: An IP protocol name or number. For valid values, go to the IpProtocol parameter in AuthorizeSecurityGroupIngress

Parameters.Name: ToPort
Parameters.Documentation: The end of port range for the TCP and UDP protocols, or an ICMP code. An ICMP code of -1 indicates a wildcard (i.e., any ICMP code).
